title: RAG Credit Memo: TSLA
executive_summary:
RAG Analysis of TSLA based on 10-K ingestion. The company shows strong revenue of $383,285.00M and EBITDA of $15,021.60M. The implied valuation suggests a base target of $12.68. Key risks identified include: Production scaling challenges and supply chain constraints.
Intense competition in the EV market from legacy automakers.
Regulatory scrutiny on Autopilot and FSD features.
